name: Mirror Knight Calling
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Orichalcos Mirror". When this card is Ritual Summoned: Special Summon 4 "Mirror Knight Tokens" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), then place 1 Shield Counter on each (max. 1). Once per turn: You can place 1 Shield Counter on every "Mirror Knight Token" you control without a Shield Counter (max. 1). When a "Mirror Knight Token" with a Shield Counter battles an opponent's monster: Its ATK becomes equal to that monster's ATK until the end of the Damage Step. If a "Mirror Knight Token" with a Shield Counter would be destroyed, remove its Shield Counter instead.
